pageContext.claim: “Antifa … you have Democrats funding them. They say Soros, and they say other people. Who knows, but they're funded. You see them standing there with weapons that are expensive, that -- that -- with signs that were made -- I mean literally, they have signs. Some of their little marches -- they have signs that were made in a high-class printing shop.”
pageContext.analysis: With absolutely no evidence, Trump suggested on Fox News that the Jewish billionaire George Soros is behind the "Antifa" movement in the United States. Right-wing critics often accuse Soros of pulling the strings behind various events that have logical explanations, a common anti-Semitic trope, according to experts.
